metadata.title: CVE-2017-9986 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
The intr function in sound/oss/msnd_pinnacle.c in the Linux kernel through4.11.7 allows local users to cause a denial of service (over-boundaryaccess) or possibly have unspecified other impact by changing the value ofa message queue head pointer between two kernel reads of that value, aka a"double fetch" vulnerability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9986` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic-lpae - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-lowlatency - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-extra-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
No subscription required

linux-image-4.13.0-1005-raspi2 - 4.13.0-1005.5
No subscription required
